output:
SELECT DATE_TRUNC('month', o.order_date) AS month,
       SUM(oi.price) AS revenue
FROM orders o
JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id
GROUP BY month
ORDER BY revenue DESC
LIMIT 5;

FROM orders o

GROUP BY month
ORDER BY revenue DESC
LIMIT 3;
